channel.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
channel.description:
So, will you use Black Mesa when you want to play Half life 1? Just curious.
I mean, of course you will want to come back to the vanilla Half life 1 every once in a while, but will you play Black Mesa more than Half life 1?

item.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
item.dc:creator: mrrampant
item.description:
Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?

Possibly. Especially depending on how Xen is redone. The nostalgia will be there, but honestly, it will be much better playing the whole series when it’s all pretty much on the same page tech wise. Let the fragging begin.

Read full topic
item.source: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?

item.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
item.dc:creator: Insomniak
item.description:
Yes and no? I may end up liking it more than HL1, but I’ll always remember my initial reaction to various events in the original. I’m just itching to see how BMS looks.

Read full topic
item.source: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?

item.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
item.dc:creator: Whippy
item.description:
GarynDakari:

I don’t know…

I played the entire Half-Life series. I actually enjoyed it more than HL2 and Ep1.

I have been saying this to my friends for years. The reason I feel this way is that HL2 + Episodes is more of a Source Engine Tech demo and less like a game. Half Life is a damn good game.

Read full topic
item.source: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?

item.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
item.dc:creator: Schrikvis
item.description:
Seeing as I’ve never finished playing hl1 nor the source version, yes. Yes it will.

Read full topic
item.source: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?

item.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
item.dc:creator: DarknessDudeTOB
item.description:
Nope.

Half-Life 1 just has that charm, and nostalgia. Black Mesa (Source) is a recreation of HL1 with extra parts and changed things. It also can’t replace it because of mods.

Read full topic
item.source: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?

item.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
item.dc:creator: GarynDakari
item.description:
I don’t know…

I played the entire Half-Life series(With the exception of Decay and HL: Source) for the first time just last year, in order of when they were each released, and IMO, HL aged pretty well. I actually enjoyed it more than HL2 and Ep1.

I guess I’ll have to play BMS first to decide, but for some reason I get the feeling I’ll play HL1 again at some point in the future.

Read full topic
item.source: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?

item.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
item.dc:creator: squiffel
item.description:
Replace it no, but I can’t wait to go back to the Half-Life universe and this mod, revamp looks incredible.

Read full topic
item.source: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?

item.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
item.dc:creator: Heavy
item.description:
I think Black Mesa will replace Half-Life for me, sinse it follows it’s basic pattern, while bringing the whole new layer of design and architrcture. But who knows really, we’ll see after release

Read full topic
item.source: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?

item.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
item.dc:creator: Trivo
item.description:
If it follows the storyline, considering it will have greatly improved graphics, then yes. Also there is the thing that the old HL1 bugs will be gone, giving way to the new ones from Source, so it will either be a + or a - there.

Read full topic

item.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
item.dc:creator: Spooky
item.description:
Replace? No. Remind? Yes. They aren’t the same.

item.source: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?

item.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
item.dc:creator: Black_Hawk
item.description:
If you consider graphics, sounds… the answer is certainly “Yes!”, but we all know that the major challenge of Black Mesa Team is re-creating the original atmosphere. I’m confident it will be a success!

item.title: Will Black Mesa replace Half Life 1 for you?
item.dc:creator: Twilight-the-pony
item.description:
CursorXP:

Twilight-the-pony, You don’t say! It’s was’t a question, you-all did’t have to answer.

And now the question: what will you do after release BM?

First; play trough the mod drunk. Second, play through the mod sober. Third; Learn how to hack source mods. Fourth – Add Twilight Sparkle in the Xen tram.

Probably in that order. Can’t vouch for first and second…
